name: Sacred Gold
notes: You should edit config file, which located here: '/drive_c/GOG Games/Sacred Gold/Settings.cfg' and change line SHOWMOVIE : 1 to SHOWMOVIE : 0 otherwise you will experiencing black screen after starting game.
content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the GOG setup exe
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Sacred Gold/Sacred.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Running GOG Installer
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: winxp
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    key: GrabFullscreen
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\X11 Driver
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: Y
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1024x768
  esync: true
  version: lutris-4.13-x86_64
